LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchApparelCommoner.label: Commoner apparel
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchApparelCommoner.descrip: Tailor various Regency-era outfits and accessories for practical everyday wear by Mousekin commoners.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchApparelMiddle.label: Middle-class apparel
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchApparelMiddle.descripti: Tailor various outfits worn by Mousekin professionals, including high-class servants, Guardeners, priests and nuns. Requires a Mousekin wearing Research Glasses to research.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchApparelMilitary.label: Military apparel
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchApparelMilitary.descrip: Tailor padded gambesons and smith various armors and helmets to protect Mousekin soldiers and knights in battle. Requires a Mousekin wearing Research Glasses to research.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchApparelNoble.label: Aristocratic apparel
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchApparelNoble.descriptio: Tailor stylish formal apparel for aristocratic Mousekins with discerning tastes. Requires a Mousekin wearing Research Glasses to research.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchAlchemy.label: Medicinal alchemy
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchAlchemy.description: Concoct poultices and potions from a variety of herbal and mineral ingredients.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchCharcoal.label: Charcoal
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchCharcoal.description: Refine wood into charcoal, which can be used as a highly-efficient fuel source or as an ingredient in various Mousekin medicinal potions.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchMachineryBasic.label: Clockwork mechanisms
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchMachineryBasic.descript: Craft intricate components and wind-up spring mechanisms for use in a variety of devices, such as automatic crossbows. Requires a Mousekin wearing Research Glasses to research.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchMachineryAdvanced.label: Heavy machinery
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchMachineryAdvanced.descr: Build heavy machinery such as water-powered bloomeries and rock-throwing onagers. Requires a Mousekin wearing Research Glasses to research.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchMining.label: Deep mining
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchMining.description: Build deep shaft mine entrances to allow underground mining of common and exotic minerals. Requires a Mousekin wearing Research Glasses to research.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchGunpowder.label: Gunpowder
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchGunpowder.description: Craft primitive Mousekin explosives used as propellants in weapons such as muskets, swivel guns and cannons. Requires a Mousekin wearing Research Glasses to research.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchCookingIronStoves.label: Cast-iron stoves
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchCookingIronStoves.descr: Build cast-iron stoves for cooking more complex Mousekin dishes.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchBeekeeping.label: Apiaries
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchBeekeeping.description: Build wooden beehives to obtain honey for culinary and brewing purposes, as well as beeswax for candles.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchCookingNoble.label: Aristocratic cuisine
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchCookingNoble.descriptio: Prepare culinary masterpieces for the most discerning of Mousekin palates. Requires a Mousekin wearing Research Glasses to research.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchBuildingVillage.label: Cottage building
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchBuildingVillage.descrip: Build houses for Mousekin commoners using wattle-and-daub walls, doors and windows.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchBuildingCastle.label: Castle architecture
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchBuildingCastle.descript: Build mansions for Mousekin nobles, and construct fortifications to protect Mousekin communities from outside threats.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchGlassmaking.label: Glassmaking
LanguageData.Mousekin_ResearchGlassmaking.description: Melt sand at high temperatures into glass for fabricating windows. (Only available if Fertile Fields mods is installed)
